title: Yawao to Katako
sinopse:
Effeminate man vs unpopular girl. For those who hate themselves, this is a love (?) comedy about conquering self-consciousness. "Men don't like me," "I have no confidence," "I'm boring"...

A girl with low self-esteem goes to a mixer and meets the love of her life... But, wait, he's just a nosy effeminate man?! With the help of Koyanagi, the pretty-faced man, Fujiko's quest for self-acceptance starts!

(Source: Shodensha, translated)
